#summary Tools for computer

= Emulators =

They read programs compiled (made) for a certain type of machine in another machine. Some allow you to read .nds (Nintendo DS) files in your computer:
  * MicroLuaSimulator
  * [DeSmuME DeSmuME]
  * [http://dualis.1emu.net/links.html Dualis]
